TRUE : FALSE) : FALSE) ==> (unsigned __CPROVER_bitvector[65])__CPROVER_OBJECT_SIZE(pResponse) >= (unsigned __CPROVER_bitvector[65])(__CPROVER_POINTER_OFFSET(pResponse) + 8ul) + 8
